description: Knowledge patterns for Google Generative AI SDK.

google-genai-setup.name: Google Generative AI Setup
google-genai-setup.description: Basic setup for Google's Generative AI SDK
google-genai-setup.usage: Use this pattern to initialize the model and client.
google-genai-setup.code:
import google.generativeai as genai
import os

genai.configure(api_key=os.environ['GOOGLE_API_KEY'])
model = genai.GenerativeModel('gemini-1.5-flash')

google-genai-structured-output.name: Structured Output with Pydantic
google-genai-structured-output.description: Enforce strict JSON output using Pydantic models with Gemini
google-genai-structured-output.usage: Use whenever an agent needs to return structured data.
google-genai-structured-output.code:
import google.generativeai as genai
from pydantic import BaseModel

class Recipe(BaseModel):
    recipe_name: str
    ingredients: list[str]

model = genai.GenerativeModel('gemini-1.5-flash', generation_config={'response_mime_type': 'application/json', 'response_schema': Recipe})
response = model.generate_content('Cookie recipe')
print(response.text)

google-genai-safety.name: Safety Settings
google-genai-safety.description: Configure safety filters for Gemini models
google-genai-safety.usage: Apply to all agent initializations to ensure A4 (Non-Harm) compliance.

google-genai-system-instruction.name: System Instructions
google-genai-system-instruction.usage: Use to inject Core Axioms and Agent Purpose.
google-genai-system-instruction.code:
model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    'gemini-1.5-flash', 
    system_instruction='You are a helpful AI assistant. You must follow these axioms...'
)

google-genai-tools.name: Tool Use (Function Calling)
google-genai-tools.description: Register Python functions as tools for Gemini
google-genai-tools.usage: Use when agent needs to perform actions or retrieve data.
google-genai-tools.code:
def add(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    return a + b

model = genai.GenerativeModel(tools=[add])
chat = model.start_chat(enable_automatic_function_calling=True)
